name: Kaiju Clicker
description:
Stranded in an endless wasteland, you must fight to survive against a never-ending onslaught of kaiju for as long as possible.

Gain the power to destroy kaiju in the palm of your hands! 

Travel a post-apocalyptic plane populated by hordes of giant monsters. Experience a world rendered in a mix of 2D art styles as you cut through the swarm. Hone your kaiju slaying skills with upgrades. Death is inevitable, but you won’t go down without a fight. See how long you can survive!

Farm kills faster by choosing when to spend points.

  • Increase your raw damage
  • Hit enemies multiple times for extra rewards
  • Or turn on auto for a helping hand

Slay normal kaiju to draw out their boss. Kill them and you might have enough time to survive the next wave.

Playable on Android.
